biotools.summary: EBI Tools is a project that aims to provide programmatic access to the various databases and retrieval and analysis services that the European Bioinformatics Institute (EBI) provides through Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) and other related web service technologies. Example tools include those to compute sequence similarity searches, pairwise/multiple sequence alignment and protein functional analysis.
